content: FalconWing prototype flight #FW1: supersonic test near Mach 1.8, checking structural stress.
EcoLiner demo flight #EL2: hybrid engine run, winglet drag measurement, 2-hour flight.
metadata: Ref: DES-102, date: 2025-03-10, test engineer: gina.rossi@aero.co

content: VTOLX tilt test #VTX3: vertical lift transition to forward flight, urban environment sim.
HeavyHaul stress loading #HH1: cargo bay structural integrity test with max payload.
StratoScan UAV high-altitude #SS1: solar panel efficiency at 65k ft, loiter test 6 hours.
metadata: Ref: DES-105, date: 2025-04-01, remote pilot: jeff.teeter@aero.co
